Html:
Do you remove older versions of the software each time an update is released ?

I downloaded 1.3.2 about a month ago and not that version no longer shows on the site.

Just wanted to understand why you wouldn't leave older versions available when you release updates ?

Thanks.

Richard

hello richard,

yes, i do something wrong in my release strategie. *sorry
i use the replace feature strictly but this is not the best idea.

for the future i want to do the follows:

Major and first Minor number changes comes as update.
this may need a DeveloperToolbox upate(office compatibility component).

2nd Minor Number changes comes as replacement and with an updated entry in a history page.
a DeveloperToolbox update is not necessary.

do you need the source code from 1.3.2 Release?

Sebastian
